H1.style: font-size: 32px;color: #000000;font-family: sans-serif;font-weight: 900;-webkit-text-stroke-width: 0.5px;-webkit-text-stroke-color: #333;text-shadow: 0 1px 2px #00000030;text-shadow: 0 0.5px 1px #00000045;background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(270deg, #000000 0%,#3b4aa3 23%,#879cd6 39%,#d2e3fc 59%,#59402e 61%,#d68645 75%,#daa665 86%);background-clip: text;-webkit-background-clip: text;text-fill-color: transparent;-webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;

div.H1: Hi, my name is Mark Valentino, and I'm a web developer.
